## Erc721.lazyMint() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
lazyMint(metadatas: NFTMetadataOrUri[], options?: {
        onProgress: (event: UploadProgressEvent) => void;
    }): Promise<TransactionResultWithId<{
        [x: string]: import("../types").Json;
        name?: string | number | undefined;
        description?: string | null | undefined;
        image?: string | null | undefined;
        external_url?: string | null | undefined;
        animation_url?: string | null | undefined;
        uri: string;
        id: BigNumber;
    }>[]>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                                     | Description       |
| --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------- |
| metadatas | [NFTMetadataOrUri](./sdk.nftmetadataoruri.md)\[\]                                        |                   |
| options   | { onProgress: (event: [UploadProgressEvent](./sdk.uploadprogressevent.md)) =&gt; void; } | <i>(Optional)</i> |
